code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./Expenditures.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Expenditures=()=>{const[expenditures,setExpenditures]=useState([]);const[newExpenditure,setNewExpenditure]=useState({asset:'',quantity:0,base:''});useEffect(()=>{fetchExpenditures();},[]);const fetchExpenditures=async()=>{const res=await axios.get('/api/expenditures');setExpenditures(res.data);};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await axios.post('/api/expenditures',newExpenditure);fetchExpenditures();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Expenditures"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"space-y-2 mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Asset ID",value:newExpenditure.asset,onChange:e=>setNewExpenditure({...newExpenditure,asset:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Quantity",type:"number",value:newExpenditure.quantity,onChange:e=>setNewExpenditure({...newExpenditure,quantity:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Base ID",value:newExpenditure.base,onChange:e=>setNewExpenditure({...newExpenditure,base:e.target.value})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"expenditures-button",children:"Record"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:expenditures.map(e=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[e.asset.name," - ",e.quantity]},e._id))})]});};export default Expenditures;
